name: Vampire Mage
description: The Vampire Mage is a powerful Medium Undead being with formidable spellcasting abilities combined with its innate vampire powers.
memorable: Its ability to regenerate and turn into mist makes it a challenging opponent, along with its charming manipulations.
goals: To dominate and manipulate others while seeking to recover its powers in a resting place.
relations: Vampires, undead creatures, and other magical beings.
environment: Gothic settings, often found in dark castles or crypts.
strengths: High hit points, damage resistances to necrotic damage and non-magical attacks, spellcasting prowess.
weaknesses: Susceptible to radiant damage and certain spells; weaknesses to sunlight and running water.
attacks: Uses melee attacks such as a bite that inflicts necrotic damage, and powerful spells like fireball and blight.
most_powerful_ability: Regeneration, allowing it to regain hit points at the start of its turn unless harmed by radiant damage.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 120 feet and a passive perception of 17, indicating keen awareness.
skills: Excels in perception, persuasion, and stealth, showcasing its abilities in manipulation and evasion.
additional_information: Can charm victims into becoming willing targets.
Required to rest in a specific lair to regain powers.
Legendary Resistance allows it to avoid failure at great cost.
Misty Recovery enables it to escape death by turning into mist.
Spider Climb allows traversing on difficult surfaces, enhancing mobility.
spellcasting: 7th level spellcaster with spells including fireball, blight, and darkness, focused on control and damage.
test_queries: vampire that can turn to mist
